def switch_units_in_maths(maths, units_in, units_out): # Note that this function will replace any and all occurrences of the "units_in" # string within the "maths" string with the "units_out" string. It's worth noting that # in order to be sure that only full name matches for units are replaced, we exploit # the fact that the units names in the MathML string will be in quotation marks, and include # these quotation marks on either side of the in and out strings for safety.
in_with_quotes = "\"" + units_in + "\"" out_with_quotes = "\"" + units_out + "\""
new_maths = maths.replace(in_with_quotes, out_with_quotes)
return new_maths
